name: EDriveToken
description: EDriveToken is an ecosystem built to revolutionize the automotive sector in areas in which blockchain and DeFi can have an impact. EDT is the utility token of the ecosystem and will work to access different features on different projects. 2 projects to start: 1. tokenization of collectorsâ€™ cars, which will be accessible through WL and spots will be given to users who stake EDTs; 2. DApp to charge EVs, which will include our business model Drive2Save that allows users paying their charges via EDTs some discount points to be used to purchase free charges or donate them to partner NGOs promoting sustainability.
